title: bhagaLaa dhEviya
sahitya:
bhagaLA dEviya bhajisai manujA bagevara bhItiya paritODisuva



anupallavi



 agaNita mahimeya AtmArAmEya nagaripunutEya nArAyaNIya



caraNam



 bagebageyAgirE bagegoLisutaliha sogayi parAgada saradim pADi

hagaliruLalliyu hogaLuva bhaktaramige salahuva shrI harikEshAngiya
